name: SynCo 2321
description:
SynCo 2321 is a thrilling third-person action RPG shooter set in the year 2321 after the greatest war earth has ever known. Survive the fallout in a world scorched , cut off from the off-world colonies. Uncover the truth as you struggle to survive the hordes and locate supplies needed to live. Find the evidence you need to expose SynCo as you work your way through the last standing city on earth. Fight your way across the galaxy to help liberate the off world colonies from the tyrannical rule imposed upon them. Can you help to free all of humanity from a corporate conglomerate with a choke hold on every single human?

Fight and sneak your way through each stylized act as you follow the story through multiple (semi)open world beautifully detailed environments. Face off against humans infected with a maddening bioweapon, corporate assault forces, and aliens on your journey to save humanity.

Influence the story through your actions and choices allowing players to experience the game in different ways.

Game development is ongoing to ensure player experiences are engaging, active and fun.
